venue.address_1: North Market Building, Faneuil Hall Marketplace
venue.name: McCormick & Schmick's

item.description:
This is the first meetup I've organized so I hope you can make it(and I'm not sitting there by myself ) .... how can you go wrong with dinner for $1.95!

Encourage you to pay as you order or maintain your own tab!

*** Note: Although the Bar Menu is 3:30-6:30 I plan on being there until at least 8 ish ***
item.how_to_find_us: I've never been before but I hear it's a great place. I'll be there at 4:30 to try to stake out a good spot and I'll post a meetup sign.
item.why: They have a "Special Bar Menu" between 3:30-6:30pm with $1.95 items such as Cheese Quesadilla, Cheese Burgers and Mussells to name a few. http://www.mccormickandschmicks.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=content.display&pageid=96&id=60
item.name: McCormick & Schmick's for it's "Special Bar Menu"
